#include<stdio.h>
int fi(int n)
{
    int i;
    int result = n;
    for(i=2;i*i <= n;i++)
    {
        if (n % i == 0)
            result -= result / i;
        while (n % i == 0)
        n /= i;
    }
    if (n > 1)
        result -= result / n;
    return result;
}
int main()
{
    int t,i,j,k,l;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d",&j);
        printf("%d\n",fi(j));
    }
    return 0;
}
